channel.title: How do I add images to my signature?
channel.description: I want to add an image to my signature, but when I try, it says that I can not do the image bbcode. It says that [img] is not allowed. How do I do this? And btw, I have seen people with pics in their signatures. Also, how do I get an avatar.

item.title: How do I add images to my signature?
item.dc:creator: @krackkid Krackkid
item.description:
@krackkid wrote:

Just post the image url in your sig, thats the best you can do.

Read full topic
item.source: How do I add images to my signature?

item.title: How do I add images to my signature?
item.dc:creator: @rip4d rip4d
item.description:
@rip4d wrote:

On these forums, only mods can use avatars, and nobody can use pictures in their signatures. After being here for a while, you come to like the cleanliness of the forums

Read full topic
item.source: How do I add images to my signature?
